text: An intermediate massed black hole is a black hole that is between 100 to 1,000 times the mass of our Sun. It is more massive than a stellar black hole, but less massive than a supermassive black hole. ==Examples== * M-82 X-1: the size of Mars. * Omega Centauri central black hole: between the size of Earth and Venus. ==References== Category:Black holes
title: Intermediate massed black hole
